36#include "gsskrb5_locl.h"
37
38#include <krb5/roken.h>
39
40krb5_error_code
41_gsskrb5i_address_to_krb5addr(krb5_context context,
42 OM_uint32 gss_addr_type,
43 gss_buffer_desc *gss_addr,
44 int16_t port,
45 krb5_address *address)
46{
47 int addr_type;
48 struct sockaddr sa;
49 krb5_socklen_t sa_size = sizeof(sa);
50 krb5_error_code problem;
51
52 if (gss_addr == NULL)
53 return GSS_S_FAILURE;
54
55 switch (gss_addr_type) {
56#ifdef HAVE_IPV6
57 case GSS_C_AF_INET6: addr_type = AF_INET6;
58 break;
59#endif /* HAVE_IPV6 */
60
61 case GSS_C_AF_INET: addr_type = AF_INET;
62 break;
63 default:
64 return GSS_S_FAILURE;
65 }
66
67 problem = krb5_h_addr2sockaddr (context,
68 addr_type,
69 gss_addr->value,
70 &sa,
71 &sa_size,
72 port);
73 if (problem)
74 return GSS_S_FAILURE;
75
76 problem = krb5_sockaddr2address (context, &sa, address);
77
78 return problem;
79}
80
